ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectAppointment of Auditor and Joint Auditor of the Public Sector Pension Investment Board
PrecisOrder appointing DELOITTE LLP of Montréal, Quebec as AUDITOR and the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR of the PUBLIC SECTOR PENSION INVESTMENT BOARD for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order appointing DELOITTE LLP of Montréal, Quebec as AUDITOR and the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR of the PUBLIC SECTOR PENSION INVESTMENT BOARD for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2024.
